snippet.title: Blue Prince Trailer – The PC Gaming Show: Most Wanted 2024
snippet.description:
Blue Prince is a first-person puzzle game in which you essentially build your own maze. Drawn to a mysterious mansion, you choose what types of rooms you wish to enter each time you come to a new door, rooms that contain unique puzzles you need to solve. At the end of the day, the mansion resets, with dawn bringing new and possibly unexplored rooms to master. 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1569580/Blue_Prince/

https://www.pcgamer.com

X: https://x.com/pcgamer

PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.

#pcgamer #pcgaming #PCGSMW #blueprince
